EmailTemplate.subject: Votre bureau est-il en mode printemps?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[hhttps://www.grandandtoy.com/Gtblog-actualiser-votre-bureau?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Inspirez les membres votre équipe à donner le meilleur d’eux-mêmes en actualisant votre bureau. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Gtblog-actualiser-votre-bureau?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> En savoir plus <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Gtblog-actualiser-votre-bureau?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019FR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
